title: Time Enough (with Jim Fitzpatrick MP)
itunes:title: Time Enough (with Jim Fitzpatrick MP)
description:
Labour MP Jim Fitzpatrick tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing why he will vote for the Boris Johnson's Withdrawal Agreement Bill AND in favour of the government's breakneck timetable for passing the new law. Editor of Bloomberg's Brexit Bulletin, Adam Blenford also joins to explain the procedure the law will have to go through in parliament.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
